H0.text: Whose backing band is known as The Miami Sound Machine. Gloria Garcia

H1.text: Whose backing band is known as The Miami Sound Machine. Jon Secada

H2.text: Whose backing band is known as The Miami Sound Machine. Albita

H3.text: Whose backing band is known as The Miami Sound Machine. Estefan

A4.text: Gloria Estefan started her career as lead singer of Miami Latin Boys, which was later renamed Miami Sound Machine.

A5.text: They impressed the Miami Latin Boys so much that they were invited to join the band permanently with the band's name changing to Miami Sound Machine.
